title: Music Generations 50's
description: A unique music pack, made for game developers who need fifties-like realistic music loops for their videogames or for those devs who wish to enhance their games or apps with high quality twist, rock n’ roll and doo wop themes.
longDescription:
PRODUCED BY TAO & SOUND (Custom audio)


Music Playlist


Music Generations 50’s is a unique music pack, made for game developers who need fifties-like realistic music loops for their video games or for those devs who wish to enhance their games or apps with high quality twist, rock n’ roll and doo wop themes.

Give your project the young heart of the 50’s! These loops are suitable for sandbox, adventure, platformer, chase, runner or puzzle gameplay, in-game radio stations, main menus, credits scene, story scenes, cinematics or background music for apps.


contact@taoandsound.com
technicalDetails:
Music Generations 50’s contains 8 original high quality music tracks with 8 old radio FX versions and 16 additional background music files (e.g. bass and drums only or melody only) carefully chosen to offer more versatility for the different scenes of your game.

Number of Audio tracks: 32
Number of Audio Cues: 32
Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs
Does music\audio loop: Yes
How many sound FX: no fx
How many minutes of audio provided: 43’32”
Engine Compatibility: Unreal 4.8.2

List of tracks:
Main Themes
• Baby You’re My Sunshine 1:12
• Burn The Piano 1:28
• Classic Rockin’ 1:25
• Crushed Lonely Heart 1:37
• Everybody’s at Joe’s 1:13
• Hips And Ankles (Twist’em up) 1:34
• Just Keep On Dancing 1:11
• She’s The One 1:16

• Everybody’s at Joe’s (Radio) 1:13
• Hips And Ankles (Twist’em up) (Radio) 1:34
• Just Keep On Dancing (Radio) 1:11
